Name: Rhubarb Negroni
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Rabarbaro amaro influences this Negroni, making it a tad drier and punchier than standard three ingredient Negronis.
History: Created in 2009 by Paolo Tonellotto at The Hide Bar, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Rhubarb Negroni contains 187 calories
